overview: A 1939 film report gives a brief overview of the then permanent exhibition of the Museum of Prince Paul (Karadjordjević), in which prehistoric artifacts, ancient artifacts from Stobi, Miroslav's Gospel, the Karađorđević Room, the Obrenović Room, the works of Vlaho Bukovac, Paja Jovanović, and Ivan Meštrović are presented.
title: The Museum of Prince Paul
